notes.text: These are all security issues fixed in the kernel-firmware-all-20240809-1.1 package on the GA media of openSUSE Tumbleweed.

notes.text: Improper validation in a model specific register (MSR) could allow a malicious program with ring0 access to modify SMM configuration while SMI lock is enabled, potentially leading to arbitrary code execution.
notes.title: CVE description

remediations.details: To install this SUSE Security Update use the SUSE recommended installation methods like YaST online_update or "zypper patch".
